commands.-?: Print command line options and exit
commands.-v: --version print the version information and exit
commands.-p: --propfile <argument> the JMeter property file to use
commands.-t: --testfile <argument> the JMeter test (*.jmx) file to run
commands.-l: --logfile <argument> the file to log samples to
commands.-H: --proxyHost <argument> Set a proxy server for JMeter to use
commands.-P: --proxyPort <argument> Set proxy server port for JMeter to use
commands.-u: --username <argument> Set username for proxy server that JMeter is to use
commands.-a: --password <argument> Set password for proxy server that JMeter is to use
commands.-G: --globalproperty <argument>=<value> Define Global properties (sent to servers). e.g. -Gport=123 or -Gglobal.properties
commands.-f: --forceDeleteResultFile Force delete existing results files and web report folder if present before starting the test
commands.-r: --runremote Start remote servers (as defined in remote_hosts)
commands.-X: --remoteexit Exit the remote servers at end of test (CLI mode)
commands.-g: --reportonly <argument> Generate report dashboard only, from a test results file
commands.-e: --reportatendofloadtests Generate report dashboard after load test
